participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, Emily is always eager to learn and explore new things. She has a nurturing side and loves to connect with others.
participant_1.background: i am an avid kayaker. i am also a graduate student. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Friendly and family-oriented, Mark values his relationships and finds joy in simple pleasures. He has a practical approach to life and enjoys working with his hands.
participant_2.background: i have three children. i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

content.text: what's your favourite ice cream flavor?
